vetNotes: Fido is looking very healthy. I recommend increasing the frequency of getting his teeth cleaned to at least every other day.
Mr. Floofy is looking great. Beak was trimmed under anesthesia due to overbite. Check how it is re-growing during next visit and book new trim if needed
Recommend quarantine protocol to get rid of pet-store parasites
Recommend owner sets up a humidifier in terrarium to aid shedding
